content:
I got an email saying

I am a student looking for books that treat basic subjects using a categorical framework. Would you know where one can find an electronic or physical copy of Lawvere's book Algebra Step by Step, which is listed on his website?
I had never even heard of this book! Is it available anywhere?

John Baez said:

I had never even heard of this book! Is it available anywhere?

It's mentioned on https://github.com/mattearnshaw/lawvere, but unfortunately there isn't a copy available there.
Neither ISBN returns a result at WorldCat.org, nor does the title
I can't find a webpage for the listed publisher, either. It seems like a small university press that may have only had a short lifespan
I don't have any leads on this, would need to find a person or library with a copy
@Matt Earnshaw maybe the Buffalo library?
my first guess, but doesn't appear in their online catalogue
I would email the library and ask whether they have a copy.
